'Spring's finally arrived, huh?'%K%P
'Time certainly flies.'%K%P
It hadn't been long since Maika won Akane over.%K%P
There had been a lot of trial and error\nalong the way.%K%P
But all that effort had paid off,\nand Akane could now restrain her Jinriki\nenough to stop causing blackouts.%K%P
That wasn't to say she was completely reformed,\nbut we'd at least fulfilled the conditions\nfor saving Tsubaki.%K%P
'Akane, are you listening?\nYou're a goddess, you can't go out\ndressed like that!'%K%P
'Oh, don't be such an old lady.\nWearing plain clothes too much makes you\nboring on the inside, too.'%K%P
'What are you implying?!'%K%P
'She's the same as ever, even now.'%K%P
Since the day Maika told her about her dream,\nAkane had completed her rehabilitation program,\nand Tsubaki Apartments was still standing.%K%P
After a few months I'd gotten used to seeing her\nand Inori argue without using Jinriki.%K%P
The fighting didn't bother me. It was just how\nthose two communicated.%K%P
'Fine, since I'm sooo nice, I'll do what you say.'%K%P
'Don't act all high and mighty! We're going to settle\nthis today, once and for all!'%K%P
'These two...'%K%P
Just another day at Tsubaki Apartments.%K%P
'Mmm... I'm gonna take a break.'%K%P
'Cool, I'll join you when I finish up here.'%K%P
'Heehee. Oh Sho...'%K%P
Maika threw away the pen I'd been holding and brought\nme into a warm embrace, resting her head against\nmy shoulder.%K%P
She'd started to act a lot more lovey-dovey lately.\nI guess she was getting used to being honest about\nhow she felt.%K%P
'Any new ideas?'%K%P
I looked at the notebook on my desk.%K%P
It was full of plans and diagrams of different\nways we could improve and develop the building.%K%P
'There's so much I'd love to try, but I guess we'll\nhave to wait until we find out how it's going to\ngo with Akane and Inori.'%K%P
'Don't spread yourself too thin.'%K%P
'I won't. No more trying to shoulder\nall the responsibility by myself.\nI promise.'%K%P
'After all, this is our home.'%K%P
'It sure is.'%K%P
I patted Maika's head, and she responded by nuzzling\nagainst my shoulder.%K%P
'You're like a cat.'%K%P
'Do you like that kind of thing? I can be a cat\nfor you... Meow, purrr... Heehee.'%K%P
Before I knew it I was hugging and stroking Maika\nas she self-consciously meowed.%K%P
'Heh, what would Akane and Inori think if they\nsaw us like this?'%K%P
'I think they're pretty used to it by now.'%K%P
'Inori maybe, but Akane would make fun of us\nfor sure.'%K%P
'We'll worry about that later.\nWho cares if they see us, right?'%K%P
'What about when we get new residents?'%K%P
'When they move in...I'll introduce you\nas my husband.'%K%P
'Yeah, that won't be weird at all.'%K%P
'All good things in time.\nLet people think what\nthey'll think.'%K%P
'Sure, I'm happy if you're happy.'%K%P
'I guess there's no problem, then.'%K%P
I never thought I'd see her act so affectionate\nagain.%K%P
She was all the cuter for it.%K%P
'Our next step is to talk to Inori's boss and get\nthis place officially recognized as a residence\nfor wayward goddesses.'%K%P
'You're gonna go talk to her in person?'%K%P
'Yes. This decision will have a big impact\non the future of this place,\nso we've got to do things right.'%K%P
'Anything I can do to help?'%K%P
'Hmm... When the time comes, just hold my hand.'%K%P
'Is that all?'%K%P
'Just having you there beside me will give me\nthe strength I need to go on.'%K%P
I felt like my heart was going to burst.%K%P
'It makes me happy to hear you say that.\nI'm just glad to be able to take care of you.'%K%P
'Thanks, Sho.'%K%P
'So, you're always going to take care of me?'%K%P
'Yeah, of course.'%K%P
'Then maybe it's time to make good on your promise.\nRemember, you said we'd get married when you were\nbig and strong enough to take care of me?'%K%P
'Maika?'%K%P
'From now on you'll not only have to take care of\nme, but also Tsubaki Apartments!'%K%P
